introduction: For "La notte del rock", festival of new trends, the musical underground is in turmoil, the various bands know that they have the opportunity to make the so-called "leap of faith". But it is not easy to pass the selections. Among the few who manage to do so are the "Leather Boys", a tough heavy metal band led by guitarist Sergio, and "Sound Out" which Carlo leads with a repertoire of energetic power rock but with a melodic imprint. The rivalry between the two groups turns into tension when the artistic choices are intertwined with some sentimental affairs involving the protagonists. Sergio in fact neglects his girlfriend Angela to court Diana, Carlo's girlfriend. Diana falls into Sergio's arms for a night, while Angela reacts by deciding to join Carlo and his band. Among misunderstandings, misunderstandings and fights, the moment of truth arrives: the performance in the "La notte del rock"…
